Title: Kinpatsu no Jeanie
Description: ['During the civil war a girl living in Virginia, named Jeanie, waits for her old boyfriend Robert  to marry him, according to a childish promise, but the war makes the things complicated and, Robert comes back as northerner soldier.    ', '\n', "\r\nOnly with the conflict's end, and many misadventures, their dream will become true. "]
Voices: ['Komiya, Kazue', 'Ishimaru, Hiroya', 'Maruyama, Hiroko', 'Tanaka, Mayumi', 'Inagaki, Mihoko', 'Yamada, Yasuo', 'Saka, Osamu']
